title: AcknowledgeOneOfGroupWithComment (Method)
text:
METHOD AcknowledgeOneOfGroupWithComment
Acknowledges an alarm of an alarm group. Optionally a comment and the user id can be provided.

rows.Name: usiAlarmGroupID
rows.Comment: The ID of the alarm group

rows.Name: wsComment
rows.Comment: The comment for the state transition

rows: The user who provides the comment
